DOC.brief_summary: This trial compare combination amiodarone NAC ( n=122 ) amiodarone alone NAC match placebo ( n=122 ) determine rate sustain ( last > 30 second ) clinically significant POAF reduce high risk patient within 7 day major thoracic surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Amiodarone N-Acetylcysteine Amiodarone Alone Preventing Atrial Fibrillation After Thoracic Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients ≥18 year old schedule elective thoracic surgery ( segmentectomy , lobectomy bilobectomy , pneumonectomy esophagectomy ) meet one four follow risk criterion : 1 . Female & BNP ≥ 25pg/ml ( age limit ) 2 . Male gender < 75 & BNP ≥ 25pg/ml 3 . Male age ≥75 ( No BNP limit ) 4 . History prior AF Patients sinus rhythm . Patients stable respiratory status ( respiratory distress ) . Patients capable provide write , informed consent . Patients scheduled extrapleural pneumonectomy . Hemodynamically unstable patient ( cardiogenic shock acute MI ) . Patients 2nd 3rd degree atrioventricular ( AV ) block . Patients hypersensitivity amiodarone NAC . Patients already take class Ic III antiarrhythmic drug . Hepatic insufficiency ( > 1.5 time upper normal limit transaminase level ) . Renal insufficiency ( creatinine ≥2.0 mg/dl ) . Known pregnancy .
